author: dlr
msg: Allow HTTP auth protocols to be configurable by way of a
"http-auth-types" parameter.
Neon 0.26 added support for selecting the auth protocols to use.  This
change takes advantage of that support to allow the user to specify
the auth protocols they want to use if they have a new enough Neon.
The default protocols if no config is specified are "basic" and
"digest" for HTTP, or "basic", "digest" and "negotiate" for HTTPS.
"negotiate" will typically use GSSAPI/SSPI on Windows, enabling users
-- on a secure network! -- to activate Windows auth over HTTP (the
lack-thereof being a common gotcha reported by users of Neon 0.26.1).
This change does not provide an implementation for ra_serf.
* subversion/include/svn_config.h
Add SVN_CONFIG_OPTION_HTTP_AUTH_TYPES symbol to the list of
configuration parameters available for servers.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/config_file.c
(svn_config_ensure): Write comments on the new "http-auth-types"
parameter to the config file (if it doesn't already exist).
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/session.c
(get_server_settings): Add neon_auth_types parameter and fill it in
if we have a new enough Neon, and it has been set in the config file.
(svn_ra_dav__open): If we have a new enough Neon, respect the HTTP
auth types configuration, and use its list to specify the auth
protocols to be used by Neon.
Patch by: djh
(Tweaked by me.)
Reviewed by: me
rooneg

author: xsteve
msg: Added svn-status-mark-by-file-ext
* trunk/contrib/client-side/psvn/psvn.el:
(svn-status-mark-by-file-ext): New function to allow marking by
file extension. This function is bound to "* .".

author: rooneg
msg: Check that the credentials are valid as early as possible.
Patch by: Vlad Georgescu <vgeorgescu@gmail.com>
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/sasl_auth.c:
(handle_interact): Don't check that the 'creds' variable is non-NULL here.
(svn_ra_svn__do_auth): Instead do it here, right after the call to
sasl_auth_next_credentials().

author: dlr
msg: Expose a transaction merge info retrieval API so that the newborn
libsvn_fs_util module can consume and index the merge info.
* subversion/libsvn_fs/fs-loader.h
(struct txn_vtable_t): Add 'get_mergeinfo' hook.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_base/revs-txns.c
(txn_vtable): Set 'NULL' as placeholder for 'get_mergeinfo' hook.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(txn_vtable): Set 'svn_fs_fs__txn_mergeinfo' for the 'get_mergeinfo' hook.
Patch by: Kamesh Jayachandran <kamesh@collab.net>
(Tweaked by me.)

author: rooneg
msg: * STATUS: Propose r21526.
